sentences.sContent: Police have found a vital clue .
sentences.sCn: 警方发现了至关重要的线索。

sentences.sContent: Archaeological evidence will provide clues about what the building was used for.
sentences.sCn: 考古证据将为这幢建筑的用途提供线索。

sentences.sContent: ...Herpin offered the only clue to his condition...
...This episode gave Doctor Mayer her first clue to something every doctor learns sooner or later---- most people just don’t listen very well...

phrases.pCn: 什么也不知道；毫无头绪

remMethod.val: “刻录” → 一张刻录光盘给警方新的线索 → 线索

trans.tranOther: an object or piece of information that helps someone solve a crime or mystery
